newsitem.title: ITALY: Publitalia expects revenue growth above market.
newsitem.headline: Publitalia expects revenue growth above market.

text.p: Italian advertising company Publitalia, part of broadcaster Mediaset, will show revenue growth "superior to market growth" in the first half of this year, its chairman Giuliano Adreani said.
Adreani, who is a managing director of Mediaset and responsible for the company's advertising concerns, was speaking at a meeting of the association of advertisers.
The advertising sales market is growing around six percent, according to sector data, while Publitalia has already said that in the first quarter of this year its revenue is up 10 percent.
